## Description {#details}

This file contains the declaration of the GlobalIFunc class, which represents a single indirect function in the IR.

Indirect function uses ELF symbol type extension to mark that the address of a declaration should be resolved at runtime by calling a resolver function.

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply specific operation to all resolver-related values. If resolver target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is already a global object, then apply the operation to it directly. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target is a GlobalExpr or a GlobalAlias, evaluate it to its base object and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// apply the operation for the base object and all aliases along the path.</span></CodeLine>
